word_mean_info__list.difference: 既可表静态，也可表动态。
主要用于英国，多半指动态。
主要用于美国，静态或动态均可。
指在程度上相差很小，差不多。
多用于书面语，指精确度接近某个标准以致误差可忽略不计。
常可分almost和nearly换用，但about用于表示时间、数量的“大约”时，实际数量可能多也可能少。
与almost含义基本相同，侧重指数量、时间或空间上的接近。
多用于非正式场合，常见于美国英语。

word_group.brief_definition: 走来走去；周围移动；走动
逗留, 坚持, 待在附近

闲荡；转悠；和…在一起；与…厮混；等
彻底；完全；各方面；为（或由）每个人
随便放；懒散地消磨时间；无目的地打发时间
飘落；飘浮；传播；广为流传

bilingual.source: In the past, people didn't know that the earth moves around the sun.
bilingual.target: 过去人们不知道地球围绕太阳转。

bilingual.source: The thema of the movie revolves around friendship.
bilingual.target: 电影的主题围绕友谊展开。

bilingual.source: Gravitation keeps the planets in orbit around the sun.
bilingual.target: 引力使行星围绕太阳运行。

bilingual.source: The circumferential road goes around the entire city.
bilingual.target: 这条环绕的道路围绕整个城市。

bilingual.source: The novel revolves around a mysterious murder.
bilingual.target: 这部小说围绕一桩神秘的谋杀展开。

bilingual.source: The garden path curves in a semicircle around the fountain.
bilingual.target: 花园小径围绕喷泉呈半圆形。

list.abstract: around，英文单词，作介词、副词，翻译为在附近、到处、大约、围绕、转弯等。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you ever wondered how the earth stays in orbit around the sun?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可曾有想过地球是如何在围绕着太阳周边的轨道运行着吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It looks like it works around a swivel, so the center pieces never move.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看起来这些是围绕一个轴心转动，中间的这部分保持不动。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, the only way we can detect this dark matter is through this gravitational interaction, how things orbit around it and how it bends light as it curves the space around it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，我们唯一能够探测暗物质的方法就是通过暗物质与其它物质的重力相互作用，比如物体如何围绕暗物质运行或暗物质如何扭曲光线使其周围空间呈显曲线状。

yingyinNormal.en: It's really the first time I've had an objective structure around the film saying that time literally is relative that we all experience time differently depending on where we are in the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真的是第一次围绕电影网有一个目标结构讲述时间实际上是相对的，我们经历的时间都不一样，取决于我们在宇宙的什么地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Steve. I'll see you around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 史蒂夫... 我还会在附近见到你的

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. Is Chandler around?
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德在吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Those guys don't mess around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们可不是吃干饭的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a total anarchy around here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太没组织纪律了。

yingyinNormal.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. It's going around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，喔，喔。这愤怒已经蔓延开了。

yingyinNormal.en: So it's okay for you to joke around?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你开玩笑就可以吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't turn around. Don't do anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别转身，什么都别做。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, he lives around here. Big gamer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他住在这附近，狂热玩家。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh yeah, so you can walk around naked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，你可以脱光到处走。

yingyinNormal.en: Or do we just throw our weight around?
yingyinNormal.zh: 还是只要用泰山压顶?

yingyinNormal.en: This person know way around food game?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个人对食物熟悉吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Let's go around. This way. Almost there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们绕道走吧，这边。快到了哟。

yingyinNormal.en: With a torso like that, she gets around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如此丰满的上身，她绝对声名远播啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I was thinking we would eat around four.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我打算4点左右开始吃饭。

yingyinNormal.en: It's around a dollar and most excellent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 售价一美元左右，用起来非常不错。

yingyinNormal.en: Look around. Look at all these dinosaurs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看四周，看看这些恐龙。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 彻底；完全；各方面；为(或由)每个人

examination_example.sentence: Enjoy the beauty of the world <highlight>around</highlight> and keep the eyes open to see the possibilities before you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 享受周围世界的美丽，睁大眼睛，看看你面前的各种可能性。

examination_example.sentence: Archaeologists commonly use computers to map sites and the landscapes <highlight>around</highlight> sites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考古学家通常使用计算机来绘制遗址和遗址周围的地貌。

examination_example.sentence: However, a true cashless society is probably not <highlight>around</highlight> the corner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，一个真正的无现金社会可能不会马上到来。

sense_info_list.en: in circumference or along a curving course

examination_example.sentence: The conversation <highlight>around</highlight> our environment and our responsibility toward it remains centered on shopping bags and straws.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 围绕我们的环境以及我们对环境的责任的讨论仍然集中在购物袋和吸管上。

examination_example.sentence: The emerging consensus <highlight>around</highlight> the bill is a sign that legislators are getting frightened about a politically embarrassing short-term collapse at the USPS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 围绕此议案逐渐形成的共识表明，立法者对于美国邮局短期崩溃所带来的政治尴尬感到害怕。

examination_example.sentence: Every Saturday morning, at 9 am, more than 50, 000 runners set off to run 5km <highlight>around</highlight> their local park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周六上午九点，五万多名跑步者开始绕着他们本地的公园跑5公里。

sense_info_list.en: in many different directions or places

examination_example.sentence: During the experiment, the social robot rat followed the living rats <highlight>around</highlight> and opened cage doors to let trapped rats escape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在实验期间，那只社交型机器鼠跟随真老鼠四处走动，打开笼子门让被困的老鼠逃跑。

examination_example.sentence: We stalk <highlight>around</highlight> thinking we're hot stuff.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们四处游荡，以为自己很性感。

examination_example.sentence: All <highlight>around</highlight> the world, lawyers generate more hostility than the members of any other profession—with the possible exception of journalism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在世界各地，律师比其他任何职业的员工都更容易招致敌意——可能除了新闻业人员。

examination_example.sentence: These range from <highlight>around</highlight> £500 to $5,000, and apparently the work gets more expensive the more that publishers do it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些（收费金额）从500英镑至5000美元不等，显而易见，出版机构的准备工作越多，文献发表便越昂贵。

examination_example.sentence: Starting <highlight>around</highlight> 2012, requests for the visas rose sharply; from 2011 to 2016 the number of visas issued more than doubled.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从2012年左右开始，申请签证的人数急剧增加；从2011年到2016年，签发的签证数量翻了一番多。

examination_example.sentence: At its peak <highlight>around</highlight> AD 600, this city was one of the largest human settlements in the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约在公元600年，在它处于鼎盛期时，这座城市是世界上最大的人类聚集地之一。

examination_example.sentence: Sensible ideas have been <highlight>around</highlight> for a long time, but the state-level bodies have been too conservative to implement them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管合理的建议已出现很久，但是州级部门过于保守，不愿实施。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, predictions have been <highlight>around</highlight> for two decades but have not yet come to fruition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，这些预测已经出现了二十年，但尚未实现。

examination_example.sentence: Humans are unique in their capacity to not only make tools but then turn <highlight>around</highlight> and use them to create superfluous material goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类是独一无二的，他们不仅能够制造工具，并且能转而使用这些工具创造出大量物质商品。

examination_example.sentence: But a boost in the storage capacity of batteries is making their ability to keep power flowing <highlight>around</highlight> the clock more likely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，电池存储容量的提高正使它们更有可能昼夜不停地保持电力的流动。

word_usage.usage: around常与表示动作的动词连用，如walk和drive，也常用在get around，hand around等短语动词中。
around和round都可用作介词和副词，很多情况下，两者可以通用，意义相同。美国英语中，around比round和about常见得多，在英国英语中，常用round来替代around。在指无具体方向的随意移动时，除around和round外，也可用about；

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in circumference or along a curving course

examination_example.sentence: Therefore, it's hard for these parents to fight the urge to tape pillows <highlight>around</highlight> their kids.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，对于这些父母来说，很难抑制用胶带把枕头粘在孩子身边的冲动。

examination_example.sentence: Typically, luxury brands rally <highlight>around</highlight> exclusivity to protect their business interests, namely intellectual property and preservation of brand equity (资产).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常，奢侈品牌会围绕排他性来保护其商业利益，即知识产权和品牌资产保护。

examination_example.sentence: Help remove stigma <highlight>around</highlight> their products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帮助他们消除产品的污名。

sense_info_list.en: in many different directions or places

examination_example.sentence: Don't say that you've moved <highlight>around</highlight> in jobs because you haven't found the right fit or feel that you were not challenged enough.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要说你换工作是因为你没有找到合适的工作，或者觉得你没有受到足够的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: There have been so many viruses going <highlight>around</highlight> this winter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年冬天已经有很多病毒在传播了。

examination_example.sentence: Both individuals and businesses post regularly to engage and interact with people from <highlight>around</highlight> the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 个人和企业都定期发布帖子，与来自世界各地的人进行互动。

examination_example.sentence: Look at the people <highlight>around</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看看你周围的人。

examination_example.sentence: Under Christopher Bailey as creative director they turned the brand <highlight>around</highlight> and this past year revenue hit £2.73 billion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在创意总监克里斯托弗·贝利(Christopher Bailey)的带领下，他们扭转了品牌，去年的收入达到27.3亿英镑。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 加强

sample.mean: v. 使屈辱；使降低身份
adj. 嗡嗡响的；嘈杂的
adj. 漂浮在水上的；不沉的；在船（或艇）上的；摆脱债务；在流传中；当前；有偿债能力的；经济上周转自如的
adv. 在前面；朝前地；领先；今后；在不久的将来；提前地；向前地；更多；更高
adj. （人；动植物）活的；（动物）敏捷的；愉快活泼的；明白的；感兴趣的；做出响应的；充满的；丰富的；有意义的；（感情；品质）继续存在的
adv. 出声地；能听见地；大声地
prep. 在…之中；在…气氛中；在…背景下

表示状态转变的前缀, 一般与adj连用, 构成表语形容词。
表示处于某种状态 "…的"。

去, 往, 朝, 向, 接近

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示“相对”
圆形的, 球形的, 圆弧的

word_usage.usage: around与round的区别：数字或时间短语前多用around，表“大约”。但在英式英语中，时间词组前也可用round。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 既可表静态, 也可表动态。
主要用于美国, 静态或动态均可。
大致接近, 误差可大可小。about 常可与 almost 和 nearly 换用, 但 about 用于表示时间、数量的"大约"时, 实际数量可能多也可能少。
指在程度上相差很小, 差不多。
多用于书面语, 指精确度接近某个标准以致误差可忽略不计。
多用于非正式场合, 常见于美国英语。
nearly 与 almost 含义基本相同, 侧重指数量、时间或空间上的接近。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 恢复知觉；苏醒；再度发生

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in many different directions or places

examination_example.sentence: A total of nine furry friends freely wander <highlight>around</highlight> in the office and do whatever their little hearts desire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总共有九个毛茸茸的朋友在办公室里到处自由地闲逛，随心所欲。

examination_example.sentence: It's better to let people walk <highlight>around</highlight> and talk to each other, or sit where they like.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最好让人们四处走动，互相交谈，或者坐在他们喜欢的地方。

examination_example.sentence: A number of street artists <highlight>around</highlight> the world have started expressing themselves through a practice known as reverse graffiti (涂鸦) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界各地的一些街头艺术家已经开始通过一种被称为“反向涂鸦”的做法来表达自己的想法。

examination_example.sentence: Feeling bored may signal the desire for a greater sense of community and the feeling that you fit in with others <highlight>around</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感到无聊可能意味着你渴望更大的群体感，希望自己能与周围的人融洽相处。

examination_example.sentence: Mr. Wilson says, when people start to know other people <highlight>around</highlight> them, they realize they're not that different.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威尔逊说，当人们开始了解身边的其他人时，他们会意识到自己并没有那么与众不同。

examination_example.sentence: At the minimum, most of us work because we want to be able to support ourselves, our families, and the people <highlight>around</highlight> us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至少，我们大多数人工作是因为我们希望能够养活自己、家人和身边的人。

examination_example.sentence: Temperatures in the pressurised tank will be kept to <highlight>around</highlight> 200℃.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加压罐内的温度将保持在200℃左右。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Around</highlight> the beginning of the nineteen fifties, some school kids started to use metal meal containers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约在二十世纪五十年代初，一些学生开始使用金属餐盒。

examination_example.sentence: Dips in memory, meanwhile, generally became apparent <highlight>around</highlight> age 37.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，记忆力下降通常在37岁左右变得明显。

sense_info_list.en: in circumference or along a curving course

examination_example.sentence: It also helps them develop healthy ideas <highlight>around</highlight> gender.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这也有助于他们围绕性别形成健康的观念。

examination_example.sentence: Several of the mice are observed running <highlight>around</highlight> the cage walls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 观察到几只老鼠在笼子的四周奔跑。

examination_example.sentence: He wrapped one layer of the plastic <highlight>around</highlight> the card and tried again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在卡片周围包了一层塑料，接着又试了一次。

word_usage.usage: around与round的区别：数字或时间短语前多用around，表“大约”。但在英式英语中，时间词组前也可用round。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 既可表静态，也可表动态。
主要用于美国，静态或动态均可。
大致接近，误差可大可小。about 常可与 almost 和 nearly 换用，但 about 用于表示时间、数量的"大约"时，实际数量可能多也可能少。
指在程度上相差很小，差不多。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (around the corner)即将来临; 在拐角处

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Place a few mirrors <highlight>around</highlight> your room so people can see how things look when they try them on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你的房间周围放几面镜子，这样人们在试穿时就能看到商品的样子。

examination_example.sentence: He found that the animals <highlight>around</highlight> were very beautiful, and he particularly enjoyed observing the birds he saw.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他发现周围的动物都很漂亮，他特别喜欢观察他看到的鸟。

examination_example.sentence: I can't wait to show them <highlight>around</highlight> our new house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我等不及要带他们参观我们的新房子了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Around</highlight> age six they start to avoid activities said to be for children who are "really, really smart."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 六岁左右，他们开始避免参加据说是为“非常非常聪明”的孩子们准备的活动。

examination_example.sentence: However, that was small fry compared with the city's Circus Maximus, which accommodated <highlight>around</highlight> 250,000 people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，与该市容纳约25万人的Maximus竞技场相比，这还是小巫见大巫。

examination_example.sentence: They end <highlight>around</highlight> 21: 00.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在21点左右结束。

sense_info_list.en: in circumference or along a curving course

examination_example.sentence: From 2000 to 2019, there were 7,348 major disasters <highlight>around</highlight> the world, resulting in USD 2,970 billion in economic loss.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2000年至2019年，全球共发生7348起重大灾害，造成经济损失29700亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: Travel <highlight>around</highlight> the world
examination_example.sentence_trans: 环游世界

examination_example.sentence: Researchers from Georgia Tech say that they have come up with a low-cost device (装置) that gets <highlight>around</highlight> this problem: a smart keyboard.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 佐治亚理工学院的研究人员表示，他们已经开发出一种低成本的设备来解决这个问题：智能键盘。

sense_info_list.en: in many different directions or places

examination_example.sentence: As the twins looked <highlight>around</highlight> them in disappointment, their father appeared.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当双胞胎失望地环顾四周时，他们的父亲出现了。

examination_example.sentence: As they grew more mobile, we let them move freely <highlight>around</highlight> the house during the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着他们的移动能力越来越强，我们让他们白天在家里自由活动。

examination_example.sentence: If you like, I can ask <highlight>around</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你愿意，我可以四处问问。

examination_example.sentence: Just quickly turn <highlight>around</highlight> and say, "This cake is extremely delicious and you have to tell me all about it."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只需快速转身说：“这个蛋糕非常好吃，你必须告诉我这个蛋糕的事。”

examination_example.sentence: I turned <highlight>around</highlight> and saw a pleasant woman with a big smile on her face waving to wish me a safe trip.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我转过身来，看到一位和蔼可亲的女士脸上挂着灿烂的笑容，向我挥手祝我一路平安。

sense_info_list.zh: (around the corner)即将来临; 在拐角处

examination_example.sentence: He always had a sense of curiosity, wondering what new role or challenge might be just <highlight>around</highlight> the corner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他总是有一种好奇心，想知道什么样的新角色或挑战即将到来。

examination_example.sentence: On our first morning in Paris, I went <highlight>around</highlight> the comer to the food market to pick up some groceries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在巴黎的第一个早晨，我绕过街角去菜市场买些杂货。

examination_example.sentence: Some people seem willing to work <highlight>around</highlight> the clock in their narrow specialty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人似乎愿意在他们狭窄的专业领域里夜以继日地工作。

圆形的, 球形的, 圆弧的

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 既可表静态，也可表动态。
主要用于美国，静态或动态均可。
大致接近，误差可大可小。about 常可与 almost 和 nearly 换用，但 about 用于表示时间、数量的"大约"时，实际数量可能多也可能少。
指在程度上相差很小，差不多。
多用于书面语，指精确度接近某个标准以致误差可忽略不计。
多用于非正式场合，常见于美国英语。
nearly 与 almost 含义基本相同，侧重指数量、时间或空间上的接近。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 恢复知觉；苏醒；转向另一观点；重现；再来；再度降临；再度发生
造访；拜访；经常做；习惯打扮成；（消息或笑话）流传；传播；都能分到；够每人一份
闲荡；转悠；和…在一起；与…厮混；等
走来走去；周围移动；走动
彻底；完全；各方面；为（或由）每个人
随便放；懒散地消磨时间；无目的地打发时间
飘落；飘浮；传播；广为流传

sense_info_list.en: on every sides; surrounding somebody or something

examination_example.sentence: The sea <highlight>around</highlight> the island has colorful fishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小岛周围的海域里有五颜六色的鱼。

examination_example.sentence: Some animals can take on the color <highlight>around</highlight> to protect themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些动物可以呈现周围的颜色来保护自己。

examination_example.sentence: If you are helpful, you can get on well with everyone <highlight>around</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你乐于助人，你就可以和周围的每个人都相处得很好。

sense_info_list.en: in many different directions or places

examination_example.sentence: We don't have time to look <highlight>around</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们没有时间到处看看。

examination_example.sentence: When spring comes, water gets warm and fish start to swim <highlight>around</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当春天来的时候，水变暖了，鱼开始游来游去。

examination_example.sentence: Mr Black walked <highlight>around</highlight> and offered help while we were doing an experiment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 布莱克先生在我们做实验时四处走动并提供帮助。

examination_example.sentence: It didn't appear in England until <highlight>around</highlight> 1660.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它直到1660年左右才出现在英国。

examination_example.sentence: Each person needs <highlight>around</highlight> 750kg of O2 per year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每人每年大约需要(吸入)750公斤氧气。

examination_example.sentence: It closes at <highlight>around</highlight> 4:30 p.m in winter and 5:00 p.m in summer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它（故宫博物院）大约在冬季的下午4点半和夏季的下午5点闭馆。

examination_example.sentence: I've beaten my high scores on all my phone games, thanks to all the time I spend sitting <highlight>around</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在所有的手机游戏中都取得了高分，这要归功于我花了那么多时间一直坐在这里。

examination_example.sentence: I turned <highlight>around</highlight> and found a robot waving to me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我转过身，发现一个机器人在向我招手。

examination_example.sentence: Being hopeful is the key to turning things <highlight>around</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 怀有希望是扭转局面的关键。

examination_example.sentence: I turned <highlight>around</highlight> and saw the whole mountain start to move behind me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我转过身，看到我身后的整座山开始移动。

examination_example.sentence: Thanksgiving was just <highlight>around</highlight> the corner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感恩节就要到了。

examination_example.sentence: Suddenly, a young boy came <highlight>around</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然，一个小男孩走了过来。

word_usage.usage: around与round的区别：数字或时间短语前多用around，表“大约”。但在英式英语中，时间词组前也可用round。
